name: Php The Right Way in Hebrew
tagline: Php The Right Way Hebrew Translation
body:
# PHP: The Right Way in Hebrew

## Overview

This is the GitHub Pages repository for the php-the-right-way project Hebrew translation.

## Why

This is a great project, and I was looking to contribute a bit of my own to it.
So here is the Hebrew translation.

## Who

My name is [Eran Matis](https://il.linkedin.com/pub/eran-matis/2/a44/214). 
A software engineer with a passion for web programing, Php and Drupal.
The creator of [Pest Boss](http://www.pestboss.com/).
A bit more is available in my [blog](http://www.informatis.co.il/blog/)

    < ?php
        $software = 'magic';
        $software_engineering = 'art';
        $work = 'passion';
        print 'My ' . $software_engineering . ' is my ' . $work . ' through it I make ' . $software;
    ?>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
